site_title: bitcircus101 | Tech & Creative Space in Bonn, Germany
welcome_text: A digital oasis for tech enthusiasts, creatives, and curious minds in the heart of Bonn.
main_paragraph_1: bitcircus101 is a unique space located at Dorotheenstra√üe 101 in Bonn, Germany. We're designed to be a sanctuary where technology meets creativity.
main_paragraph_2: Whether you're working on your latest project, engaging in thoughtful conversations, or simply enjoying the peaceful atmosphere, bitcircus101 provides the perfect setting for your digital and creative endeavors in Bonn.
